request.title: Routing protocol OSPFv3 for IPv6 Address family feature schema
request.description: Routing protocol OSPFv3 for IPv6 Address family feature schema

routerId.description: Set OSPF router ID to override system IP address

referenceBandwidth.description: Set reference bandwidth method to assign OSPF cost

compatibleRfc1583.description: Calculate summary route cost based on RFC 1583

defaultOriginate.description: Distribute default external route into OSPF

originate.description: Distribute default external route into OSPF disabled
Distribute default external route into OSPF enabled

metric.description: Set metric used to generate default route <0..16777214>

spfTimers.description: Distribute default external route into OSPF

delay.description: Set delay from first change received until performing SPF calculation

initialHold.description: Set initial hold time between consecutive SPF calculations

maxHold.description: Set maximum hold time between consecutive SPF calculations

translateRibMetric.description: Devices within the Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN overlay network use OMP for control plane information. Outside of the overlay, devices use other control plane protocols such as BGP or OSPF. A device at the interface between devices within the overlay network and devices outside of the overlay can translate OMP route metrics when redistributing routes to BGP or OSPF, to be usable by devices outside the overlay network.

routePolicy.description: Set route policy to apply to redistributed routes

maxMetricRouterLsa.description: Sets the protocol to advertise a maximum metric so that other routers do not prefer this router as an intermediate hop in their shortest path first (SPF) calculations

action.description: Not advertise maximum metric Router LSA policy by default
Advertise maximum metric Router LSA immediately
Advertise maximum metric router LSA after router start up with configured duration time(seconds)

onStartUpTime.description: Set how long to advertise maximum metric after router boot up

areaType.description: Normal area type, area number 0 only support normal area type

helloInterval.description: Set interval between OSPF hello packets

deadInterval.description: Set interval after which neighbor is declared to be down

passiveInterface.description: Set the interface to advertise its address, but not to actively run OSPF

spi.description: Set OSPF interface authentication IPSec SPI, range 256..4294967295

authKey.description: Set OSPF interface authentication IPSEC key

ranges.description: Summarize OSPF routes at an area boundary

documentation.description: This is the documentation for request schema for OSPFv3 feature
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema
